title: marudamalai vITriDum
sahitya:
marudamalai vITriDum muruganaip-pOTrinAl parama sukhap-pETrinai pAridil peTriDalAm


anupallavi

  sari nighar tanakkillAp-parivuDanE bhaktarai aravaNaitt-avar paDum allalaip-pOkkiDavE


caraNam    perum tiraLAik-kUDi varum tan aDiyAr sharaNamenak-kUrit-tan sannidhi sErumpOdu
Varam edaik-kOrinAlum vazhangiDum vaLLalAi perumaiyum mahimaiyum perugiDum varadanAi
